```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```


Loading .csv
```{r}
res <- read.csv("C:/Users/ricca/Desktop/UNI/Magistrale/Anno1/AA/Modulo2/project_exam/Auction-MWM-Comparison/benchmarck_graphs/results.csv")

```


# Data Manipulation
```{r}
res_2_50 <- res[0:49,]
res_51_300 <- res[50:299,]
res_301_999 <- res[300:998,]
```


# Lineplots for graphs between 2 and 50 vertices per part
```{r}
df <- res_2_50
title_vertices <- " for 2 - 50 vertices"
  
ggplot(df, aes(Edge.per.part)) +
  xlab("Number of Vertices per part") +
  ylab("Seconds") +
  geom_line(aes(y = Seconds.MWM, colour = "MWM"), color="cornflowerblue", size=1, alpha=1, linetype=1) + 
  geom_line(aes(y = Seconds.AU, colour = "AU"), color="red", size=1, alpha=1, linetype=1) +
  ggtitle(paste("MWM & AA execution time", title_vertices)) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size=20, hjust = 0.5))

ggplot(df, aes(Edge.per.part)) +
  xlab("Number of Vertices per part") +
  ylab("Total Cost") +
  geom_line(aes(y = Total.Cost.MWM, colour = "MWM"), color="cornflowerblue", size=1, alpha=1, linetype=1) + 
  geom_line(aes(y = Total.Cost.AU, colour = "AU"), color="red", size=1, alpha=1, linetype=1) +
  ggtitle(paste("MWM & AA total cost", title_vertices)) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size=20, hjust = 0.5))

ggplot(df, aes(Edge.per.part)) +
  xlab("Number of Vertices per part") +
  ylab("Iterations") +
  geom_line(aes(y = Iterations.AU, colour = "AU"), color="red", size=1, alpha=1, linetype=1) +
  ggtitle(paste("AA iterations", title_vertices)) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size=20, hjust = 0.5))
```
